This game may be six years old but I don't care god dammit. If you haven't played this game yet, you need to get it right now so you can hear this amazing ost and admire the amazing graphics that they had considering the game is six years old!

You play as a human called Chell who wakes up in a room and then soon after a robot tells her that she is in a massive underground facility. The robot then helps her multiple times throughout the story to try and help her escape while trying to avoid being killed me GLaDOS, a massive robot who controls the entire facility.

It's an old game but you gotta GET IT!

(Also you can make your own level's and play other people's levels and there are some really good ones. Also, play this game with your friends, there is an entire singleplayer campaign and co-op campaign as well as single player and co-op custom levels made by other people (as I just said)) Enjoy :P
Recomendo ,bom jogo de puzzle!!

Portal 2 offers an incredible physics based gameplay system that stays fun and engaging while allowing you to solve problems creatively all the way through.

The story, dialog and characters come together with the gameplay to create an immersive, unique experience that's impossible to put down until you finish it.

Extremely highly recommended, every single second of this game is pure joy.

Great game that brought something new with nice story and gameplay. It's already a classic and it will probably go down in history as one of the more important games in gaming industry of all time...

Great game just like the first infact better than the first and me coming from the first portal I thought that it would have been hard to beat. But the developers did it and made the secound one just as good as the first and a new story was slipped in a great new story with a fantastic ending which blew me away.

Portal 2 has so much to offer many extras inculding muiltyplayer which can be hard if you and your partner do not cooperate.

 I deffenitly recommend this game it's just as good as the first one for me portal 2 is 10/10.
